availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Adam W. Trebein (Lexington, Fayette, Kentucky, soldier)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette, Kentucky, soldier. Ohio native. Enrolled in 20th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.). Promoted from private to 2nd Lieutenant on January 28, 1862. Promoted to 1st Lieutenant on March 26, 1862. Promoted to Captain on August 30, 1862. Mustered out on January 17, 1865 in Louisville.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 38, 951.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette, Lexington, p. 197.
